article_title: Filing Your Tax Return In 2015? You Might Want To Leave Those Medical Receipts At Home

article_metadata.author: Kelly Phillips Erb

og.description: Ready to file your taxes? You might want to leave those medical receipts at home. Increasingly due to changes related to Obamacare, taxpayers are less likely to qualify to deduct medical expenses on their tax return.
og.title: Filing Your Tax Return In 2015? You Might Want To Leave Those Medical Receipts At Home
